act.title: Dialogue Reconstruction
act.intro: Put the sentences below in the correct order. (They are jumbled randomly and appear in a different order everytime you attemp the activity)

item.hanzi: 同学你好，请问校长办公室怎么走？
item.pinyin: Tóngxué nǐhǎo, qǐngwèn xiàozhǎng bàngōngshì zěnme zǒu?

item.hanzi: 哦，校长办公室，在两号楼。
item.pinyin: Ò, xiàozhǎng bàngōngshì, zài liǎng hào lóu.
Liǎng hào lóu zài cāochǎng pángbiān.

item.hanzi: 哦，好的，校长办公室在几楼？
item.pinyin: Ò, hǎode, xiàozhǎng bàngōngshì zài jǐlóu?

item.hanzi: 我不太清楚，大概顶楼吧。
item.pinyin: Wǒ bù tài qīngchǔ, dàgài dǐng lóu ba.
